fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Visit a player who is not currently infected. If you fail to use this ability, you will automatically select a random valid target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You know which players are infected.
- Visiting a player will infect them.
- Infected players will infect their visitors and whoever they visit, and their visitors as well.
- You count as infected.
- Once you infect all players, you become Pestilence With No Life Purpose (2288). This is publicly announced.
- You automatically lose if you die to a Good role or are hanged.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Avoid becoming Pestilence With No Life Purpose at all costs.
